sec.title: Maintenance instructions
sec.p: The maintenance instructions shall at least contain:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: names and addresses, or a reference to a list, of authorized repair and service agents;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: daily, weekly and other scheduled maintenance intervals;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: precautions to be observed during maintenance and service;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: specification of oils, lubricants and hydraulic fluids;

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: instructions on the maintenance of fire extinguishing systems;

list-item.label: f)
list-item.p: methods to safely remove or replace components and parts;

list-item.label: g)
list-item.p: methods to safely remove and replace ropes;

list-item.label: h)
list-item.p: information about measuring points and locations of diagnostic fault finding equipment, clearly marked in pictures and tables;

list-item.label: i)
list-item.p: drawings and functional diagrams for electric, hydraulic and pneumatic circuits. Illustrations shall be of sufficient size to be clear and show the designation of major components, their functions, locations and relationships in the whole rig;

list-item.label: j)
list-item.p: instructions of how to use special tools provided by the manufacturer;

list-item.label: k)
list-item.p: instructions for frequency of checking and for replacement of parts which are classified by the manufacturer to be of particular importance for safety. Methods to check the wear of such parts shall be given and the criteria for their repair, adjustment or replacement;

list-item.label: l)
list-item.p: instructions on checking and replacing worn safety signs and operator instruction signs;

list-item.label: m)
list-item.p: instructions for the examination and maintenance of wire ropes, see ISO 4309;

list-item.label: n)
list-item.p: instructions for the examination and maintenance of winches and travelling block;

list-item.label: o)
list-item.p: special warnings against actions which can cause injuries to the repairer or other personnel;

list-item.label: p)
list-item.p: instructions for required personal protective equipment (PPE).
